p: An even stronger amplification effect was detected for the soil moisture indicator (Table S21). Our results show a shift of the species composition towards more drought‐tolerant plant compositions, that is, an aridisation (Fig. 4b). Delta values of the community‐level soil moisture and thermic indicators were highly negatively correlated (Fig. S6), and hence mainly reflect changes in the same species. Yet, this does not necessarily mean that all species experiencing a disadvantage through warmer conditions effectively suffer from drought stress.
